description:

title: [Errno 2] No such file or directory in gate-nova-python26

comments.content:
This looks like a nova test fixture bug. I have added nova to the bug and marked the Infra side incomplete. If you can provide more info that indicates this is an Infra bug please do and we can update the bug and hopefully fix it.

All that said I think this is a bug in nova.

comments.content: I didn't see any hits for this in the past 10 days
